metadata.title: CVE-2023-52673 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix a debugfs null pointer error [WHY & HOW] Check whetherget_subvp_en() callback exists before calling it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
